actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend section 103 (e) (4) of title 23, United States Code, to provide that amounts available as a result of a withdrawal of approval of a portion of the Interstate Highway System may be used to provide operating assistance for mass transportation systems.

summary.text: Permits amounts available as a result of a withdrawal of approval of a portion of the Interstate Highway System to be used to provide operating assistance for mass transportation systems. Extends such substitution program to September 30, 1988.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 103 (e) (4) of title 23, United States Code, to provide that amounts available as a result of a withdrawal of approval of a portion of the Interstate Highway System may be used to provide operating assistance for mass transportation systems.
